Rulings.Tengu:
●This effect does not target.
●You can destroy any cards your opponent controls, not just monsters.
●If you do not control a face-up “Koa’ki Meiru” monster when the effect of “Core Blast” resolves, you can still destroy your opponent’s cards.
●You can activate the effect of “Core Blast” in the same Chain that you flip the card face-up.

Rulings.Base:
1. This effect does not target.
2. You can destroy any cards your opponent controls, not just monsters.
3. If you do not control a face-up "Koa'ki Meiru" monster when the effect of "Core Blast" resolves, you can still destroy your opponent's cards.
4. You can activate the effect of "Core Blast" in the same Chain that you flip the card face-up.
